structured.description: A simple live transcription summary using Weaviate, a real-time AI API. It fetches and displays data from a Weaviate collection named `collectionname` and sorts it by timestamp in descending order. The code uses various high-level packages such as `import streamlit as st`, `import os`, `import pandas as pd`, `import weaviate`, `import time`, `import re`, and `import datetime`. The main functions are `fetch_and_display_data()` which queries the Weaviate database, sorts the data by timestamp, and displays it in a summary format using Streamlit.

items.description: Retrieves data from a database, processes it, and displays it in an HTML page using Markdown.
items.name: fetch_and_display_data
